name: Woodle Tree 2: Worlds
description: Woodle Tree 2: Worlds is an open world platformer/adventure videogame. This time the forces of evil are taking over the Wood Lands with a black substance that is absorbing energy and life from the living creatures! Will you be able to take over this enormous new evil force?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 32-bit Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.6 GHz / AMD Dual-Core Athlon 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: SM 3.0 con 512MB VRAM; NVIDIA GeForce 8500 GT / AMD Radeon HD 4650 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: Play with the gamepad for the best experience!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Quad-Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: SM 3.0 with 1GB VRAM; NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280 / AMD Radeon HD 4830 or greater DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: Play with the gamepad for the best experience!

reviews.review_text: The game is not really perfect, but I liked it a lot. With some improvements, I'm sure it will be the game of the year  here some aspects I would improve:  - more characters  - enemies - loading times
Game is awesome. Dev support was fast and swift. I love the gameplay music and mobs. It has its challenging areas and is alot of fun.

-Game crashed on loading screen twice.  - not sure if any audio is missing on the cutscenes but it should have something as its boring sitting through ambient sound.  - no real tutorial on what to do.  - options could do with their own menu instead of being around the minimap.  Has a great potential with the art style but needs more work.
